SA15bsa061_u:11: bāhyārthavādinaḥ kila vijñānamātratāyāṃ santānāntarasattā nopapadyata iti codayanti /
SA15bsa061_u:12: tathāhi, ta evamāhuḥ - yeṣāṃ cittamātrameva sat,
SA15bsa061_u:24: tathāhi, āgamaḥ śabdātmako vā bhaved vyañjanasvabhāvo vā /
SA15bsa061_u:28: tathā sati, āgamādapi prāṇyantaraṃ pratipattuṃ na śakyata iti cet?
SA15bsa061_u:34: sa tu pratipattṛsantāne sannapyupacāratastathāgatasya vā kapilasya vā kaṇādasya vā karturvacanamiti vyapadiśyate /
SA15bsa061_u:35: evaṃ sarve 'pi bauddhā vācakaṃ śabdasāmānyākāraṃ jñānaṃ manyante;
SA15bsa061_u:40: taccānumānaṃ kāyavākkarmaṇorabhāve 'pi yathā pravartate yaddarśayitumāha - buddhipūrvāmityādi /
SA15bsa061_u:46: sāsti pūrvaṃ yasyāḥ kriyāyāḥ sā buddhipūrvā /
SA15bsa061_u:49: yadi nāma bāhyārthavādibhiḥ svasantāne tāṃ buddhipūrvāṃ kriyāṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāmupalabhya paścātparasantāne grahād vivakṣitarūpā dhīḥ vijñānaṃ gamyate,
SA15bsa061_u:55: ātmani cittaspandanapūrvau kriyābhilāpau dṛṣṭvānyatra tayordarśanād yadi spandanamanumīyeta,
SA15bsa061_u:62: tenāyamartho bhavati - ātmani jigamiṣāvivakṣāpūrvayoḥ kriyābhilāpayordarśanāt parasantāne 'pi tau kriyābhilāpau copalabhya cittaspandanamanumīyata iti cet?
SA15bsa061_u:68: nanu bāhyārthavāde tu paracittanimittake kāyavākkarmaṇī liṅgatvena svīkriyete,
SA15bsa061_u:69: antarjñeyavāde tayorabhāvāt kathaṃ sāmyamiti cet? evamāha -
SA15bsa061_u:70: tacca kāyavāgvijñaptipratibhāsi jñānaṃ jñānāntaraspandanaviśeṣeṇa vinā bhavatītyevaṃ na matam /
SA15bsa061_u:72: antarjñeyavādināpi kāyavāgvijñāptipratibhāsi kāyavāgvijñaptakārakaṃ jñānaṃ paracittasya spandanaviśeṣeṇa vinā bhavatīti na manyate /
SA15bsa061_u:79: atha parajñānasya kriyāyā anupalambhāt paradhīranumātuṃ na yujyata iti cet?
SA15bsa061_u:82: na bhavatā kadāpi parajñānapūrvake kriyāvāgākārake jñāne upalabhyete /
SA15bsa061_u:87: yato hi, eṣa upālambho bhavatāmapi tulyaḥ // 4 //
SA15bsa061_u:89: paro 'pi parajñānapūrvau tau kadāpi na paśyati /
SA15bsa061_u:92: bāhyārthavādyapi paracittaspandanapūrvakau tau kriyābhilāpau na kadāpi paśyati /
SA15bsa061_u:99: ātmanaścittasya paravartinornimittatvānupapatteḥ paracittaṃ jñāyata it cet?
SA15bsa061_u:102: yasmādātmanaścittaṃ santānāntaravartinoḥ kriyābhilāpayoḥ kāraṇatvena na yujyate,
SA15bsa061_u:117: ahaṃ vadāmīti ye svacittanimittake kāravākkarmaṇī te svasantāne upalabhyete /
SA15bsa061_u:136: antarjñeyavāde 'pi svasantāne vicchinnadeśapratibhāsinoḥ kriyābhilāpapratibhāsijñānayoḥ samutthāpakacittasya pratisaṃvedanaṃ na bhavati // 11 //
SA15bsa061_u:138: svacittaspandananimittake vijñāptipratibhāsinī jñāne cāntarmukhapratibhāsinī pratīteḥ bahirmukhapratibhāsinī anyanimittāditpadyete /
SA15bsa061_u:140: ye svacittaspandananimittake kriyāvākpratibhāsinī jñāne te cāntarmukhapratibhāsinī 'ahaṃ gacchami,
SA15bsa061_u:150: ye bahirmukhapratibhāsinī jñāne te 'nimitte iti kinneṣyete?
SA15bsa061_u:155: bhavatu kila nimittāmātrasya pratiṣedhaḥ tathāpi prakaraṇavaśāt spandanamātrasya pratiṣedho draṣṭavyaḥ // 13 //
SA15bsa061_u:159: yadi vicchinnapratibhāsinī kriyāvāgākārake jñāne spandanābhāve 'pi vinā kiṃcana kriyāvāgākāraṃ bhavet,
SA15bsa061_u:160: tadā sarvāṇyapi kriyāvāgākārakāṇi jñānāni spandanena vinā bhaveyuḥ;
SA15bsa061_u:166: ata āha - vicchinnāvicchinnapratibhāsakṛto bhedo na jñānayoḥ spandanatvanimittabhedavibhāgakṛt /
SA15bsa061_u:170: sa tu yato na jñānayoḥ spandanatvanimittasya bhedakaḥ;
SA15bsa061_u:174: atha nimittatvabhedābhāve ko doṣaḥ syāt? āha -
SA15bsa061_u:178: yato hyatra bhinnabhūtayoḥ jñānayoḥ kriyāvākpratibhāsatve na kaścid viśeṣo 'sti /
SA15bsa061_u:182: tathā sati, avicchinnatvaviśiṣṭaḥ pratibhāsabheda eva spandanapūrvako na bhavati /
SA15bsa061_u:186: tasmād yo 'vicchinnatvaviśiṣṭaḥ kriyāvākpratibhāsaḥ sa kevalaṃ spandananimittako na bhavati /
SA15bsa061_u:191: tenātrāyaṃ samudāyārthaḥ - vicchinnāvicchinnabhedamanapekṣya sāmānyena kriyābhilāpayoḥ pratibhāsamātraṃ spandananimittakam /
SA15bsa061_u:192: yato hi kaścid vicchinno 'pi pratibhāsa spandanapūrvako dṛśyate,
SA15bsa061_u:200: śaropalaprakṣepaṇāni yantraṃ ca nirmāṇaṃ ca parapracālanaṃ cetivigrahaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:209: etaduktaṃ bhavati - vicchinnapratibhāso 'spandanapūrvakatvena na vyāpta iti // 18 //
SA15bsa061_u:219: tena hyatra kriyāviśeṣamātreṇa spandanasya pratītiriti yujyate /
SA15bsa061_u:241: yato hi yadi kasyacidatatpūrvakatvaṃ bhavet sarvasyātatpūrvakatvaṃ prasajyeta /
SA15bsa061_u:245: na hyevaṃ śakyate 'numātum - ṃrāgād vadatīti vā dveṣādvā mohādvā /
SA15bsa061_u:255: ātmani spandanānupalambhāt sāmarthyādanyatra spandanamanumīyata iti cet /
SA15bsa061_u:266: tadavaśyamabhyupagantavyamiti darśayitumāha - tenāvaśyaṃ tau spandananimittakatvāttadabhāve na bhavata iti vaktavyam /
SA15bsa061_u:268: tathāvipratipannena bāhyārthavādināvaśyamiyamupapattirvaktavyā - tayoḥ kriyābhilāpayoḥ spandanajanyarūpatvāt spandanābhāve tau na bhavata iti // 25 //
SA15bsa061_u:273: antarjñeyavādyapi tathaiva vadet - vicchinnapratibhāsijñāne spandanajanyarūpatvāttadabhāve na bhavata iti /
SA15bsa061_u:274: tathā sati nānayoḥ bāhyārthavādāntarjñeyavādayoḥ parasparaṃ bhedo 'sti /
SA15bsa061_u:275: etaduktaṃ bhavati - yathā bāhyārthavādī parasambaddhakriyābhilāpau spandanajanyarūpatvāt tadabhāve na bhavata iti vadati,
SA15bsa061_u:276: tathaivāntarjñeyavādyapi bāhirmukhapratibhāsijñāne spandanajanyatvāt tadabhāve na bhavata iti vadet /
SA15bsa061_u:282: kriyābhilāpapratibhāsijñānayoḥ spandananimittakatvaṃ vadan yogācāraḥ svapnāvasthāyāmapi tayoḥ spandananimittakatvaṃ kinna vadatīti pūrvapakṣāśaṅkā // 27 //
SA15bsa061_u:285: paro 'pi svapnopalabdhaparakriyāvācau spandananimittike iti kinna vadati?
SA15bsa061_u:288: kiṃ tarhi? etadapi pūrveṇa saha sarvaṃ samānamiti śeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:290: bāhyārthavādyapi svapnāvasthāyāṃ yau parasambaddhau kriyābhilāpāvupalabhyete tau paracittanimittakāviti kinna vadati // 28 //
SA15bsa061_u:302: atha middhenopahatatvāt puruṣasyārthaśūnyaṃ vijñānaṃ jāyata iti cet /
SA15bsa061_u:310: antarjñeyavādīnāṃ mate 'pitasmāt middhena bhrāntatvādeva parādhipatyarahite kriyābhilāpākāreke jñāne jāyete itīṣṭam // 32 //
SA15bsa061_u:311: evaṃ tāvat sautrāntikena saha samānatāṃ pratipādya vaibhāṣikamatāśaṅkyāha -
SA15bsa061_u:312: atha svapne 'pi jñānasyārthavattvāttadopalabhyamānānyapi santānāntarāṇyeva iti cet /
SA15bsa061_u:314: svapne 'pi jñānasyārthavattvāt svapnāvasthāyāṃ yeṣāṃ prāṇināmupalabdhirbhavati te ca sattvāḥ santyeva satyataḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:318: tadā parābhimataṃ tasya parādhipatyaṃ na ko 'pi nivārayet /
SA15bsa061_u:320: yaḥ yuktyā āgamācca rahitaḥ sa yuktyāgamarahitaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:325: tadā yogācārabhimataṃ sattvasya tathāvidhaparadhipatyamapi na kaścinnivārayet /
SA15bsa061_u:326: tathāhi, bhavadbhiḥ svapnāvasthāyāṃ ye sattvāḥ abhyupagatāḥ,
SA15bsa061_u:327: teṣāmevādhipatyādasmākaṃ vijñaptipratibhāsāḥ jāyanta iti vaktavyaṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa061_u:328: tena hi yad viṣamatvaṃ yuktyāgamarahitatvaṃ tadevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA15bsa061_u:331: tathā sati svapnadṛṣṭarūpasya sapratighatvaṃ sanidarśanatvañca bhavet /
SA15bsa061_u:332: tena hi hastyādīnāṃ gavākṣādiṣu praveśo nopapadyeta,
SA15bsa061_u:342: svapnadṛṣṭarūpasya sadbhāvābhyupagame tvevemādayo bahavo doṣā prasajyante // 34 //
SA15bsa061_u:343: evaṃ tāvat samānatāṃ prasādhya svapakṣe yuktyāgamarahitatvaṃ parihartumāha -
SA15bsa061_u:344: etat keṣāñcinmata eva sarvāṇi tathāvidhāni jñānāni santānāntarāyattāni /
SA15bsa061_u:348: keṣāzncid yogācārāṇāṃ mata eva jāgradavasthāvat svapne 'pi tathāvidhānī kriyāvāgākārajñānāni parasantānā yattāni bhavanti /
SA15bsa061_u:358: devādyadhiṣṭhānataḥ supriyavaṇijo vijñaptipratibhāsīni jñānāni jāyante ādītyanena yogipiśācādīnāmadhiṣṭhānāni saṃgṛhītāni // 37 //
SA15bsa061_u:367: muhurbhavataiva paryanuyujyate - kasmāt bhavatparikalpitayā tayā kriyayā paracittaṃ jñāyate // 39 //
SA15bsa061_u:374: tasya kāryatvaṃ tu cittantare 'pi tulyamiti kathanna jñāyate?
SA15bsa061_u:375: tasya kāryatvamityādi kriyā cittasya kāryatvāccittasya gamiketi cet?
SA15bsa061_u:376: cittasya tatkāryatvaṃ tu kriyāpratibhāsijñāne 'pi tulyatvāttena kriyāpratibhāsenāpi kasmāt paracittaṃ na jñāyate // 41 //
SA15bsa061_u:378: api ca, yadi tatkriyā svasattāmātreṇa svasantānaṃ pratyāyet,
SA15bsa061_u:381: kiñceyaṃ kriyā sattāmātrāt paracittamavabodhayed ohosvit jñānāt?
SA15bsa061_u:387: na hi liṅgaṃ sattāmātrāt gamakaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa061_u:391: tadā tatra kimanayā paramparayā - paracittāt kriyā,
SA15bsa061_u:394: tadā tatretyādi syānmatam - liṅga jñānamapekṣya gamakamiti /
SA15bsa061_u:395: hanta, tarhi na kiñcit prayojanamanayā paramparayā /
SA15bsa061_u:414: spandanamātrasāmānyāṃ kriyābhilāpajñānasāmānyasya kāraṇatvāt kāryeṇa lāraṇasya gatiḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:419: ata eva uktam - kāryeṇa karaṇasya gati iti /
SA15bsa061_u:422: evaṃ sāmānyena kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ nirdiśya kāryasya bhedamupadarśayitumāha -
SA15bsa061_u:434: etayoḥ saḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ svāpādyavasthāyāmitarasyāmapi ca samānaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:441: bhrāntyavasthāyāṃ yathāsvaṃ pratyayaviśeṣopāśrayāt paraspandanādinimittodbhūtavijñānavāsanaiva kadācitparābhogādeḥ vyavahitādapi vṛttiṃ labhate,
SA15bsa061_u:452: ādītyanena mukhakāntiraktimādīnāṃ janakacittasya paroigrahaḥ paraspandanādi ca nimittaṃ ceti samāsaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:454: yasya kriyādipratibhāsivijñānasya tadanyasmāt spandanādinimittādudbhavituṃ śīlamasti tat paraspandādinimittodbhūtavijñānam /
SA15bsa061_u:456: parābhogaḥ paramanaskāraḥ ādītyanena tatkālabhāvināṃ tadanyapratyayānāṃ parigrahaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:460: evamuktaṃ bhavati - bhrāntyavasthāyāṃ pratyayaviśeṣasya upāśrayāt paraspandanādinimittadudbhūtavijñānavāsanā kadācit vyavahitād parābhogādapi vṛttiṃ labhate /
SA15bsa061_u:462: evaṃ svapnāvasthāyāmapi kriyāpratibhāsijñānānāṃ spandananimittakatvaṃ sādhayitvā upasaṃhartum āha -
SA15bsa061_u:465: tasmāt svāpajāgradubhayorapyavasthayoḥ kriyāpratibhāsāt cittaspandanamanumīyata eveti sthitam /
SA15bsa061_u:468: kriyātaḥ spandanapratipattau svāpa itarasmiñca syāt pratipattiratha vā naiva kadācana /
SA15bsa061_u:473: tadā tat jāgradavasthāyāmapi yujyeta na kadāciyt kriyātaḥ spandanasya pratipattirbhavediti vākyaśeṣaḥ // 52 //
SA15bsa061_u:486: ālambanaṃ tu spandanābhāve 'pyutpadyate, na tu kriyā /
SA15bsa061_u:497: yasya vyapadeśasya santi sarve prakārāḥ sa sarvaprakāravyapadeśaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:501: evamuktaṃ bhavati - jāgradavasthāvat svapnāvasthāyāmapi dṛśyākārādayaḥ sarve santi /
SA15bsa061_u:513: tadā mahābhramarājñyā avidyāyāḥ sadbhāvāt tadvaśācca sarvāṇi jñānānyarthaśūnyāni jāyanta iti manyeran // 57 //
SA15bsa061_u:515: tathā satyarthāntaravādahānyā ete 'nekāśakyanigūhanāvatārāḥ mahākṛcchrā uttareṇaikena nihatā bhavanti /
SA15bsa061_u:520: yasmārthāntaravādasya aneke avatārāḥ doṣāḥ parihāralakṣaṇenāśakyanigūhanāḥ santyamī anekāśakyanigūhanāvatārāḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:527: evaṃ santānāntarasiddhiṃ parisamāpyāvaśiṣṭān durupālambhān parihartukāmaḥ paramatamāśaṅkitum āha -
SA15bsa061_u:528: nanu tayoḥ darśanāt kāyavāgvijñaptibhyāṃ svamutthāpakacittasyānumānamiti nyāyyam /
SA15bsa061_u:536: ye ca śrotṛsantānasambaddhavijñaptipratibhāsijñāne spandanasya gamake iti bhavadbhiriṣṭe,
SA15bsa061_u:545: nocyate paracittasamitthitavijñaptirūpatvāt tatra pratibhāsijñānena samutthāpakacittaṃ gamyata iti /
SA15bsa061_u:550: sā yasya pratibhāsino jñānasya rūpaṃ svabhāvo 'sti tattathā /
SA15bsa061_u:554: evamuktaṃ bhavati - yasmāt tatra pratibhāsi jñānaṃ paracittasamutthitavijñaptirūpam,
SA15bsa061_u:555: tasmāt samutthāpakacittaṃ gamyata iti vayamapi nābhyupagacchāmaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:563: yadi śrotṛsantānājjāte kriyāvāgākārake jñāne vijñaptitvena neṣyete,
SA15bsa061_u:567: samutthāpakacittasantānājjāte ye kriyāvāgākārake jñāne te vijñaptitvena vyapadiśyete /
SA15bsa061_u:568: evamuktaṃ bhavati - vaktureva ye gamanābhilāpane kriyāvāgākārake jñāne te vijñaptīti ucyete // 61 //
SA15bsa061_u:569: samutthāpakacittaṃ svaparasantānagatayoḥ kriyāvāgākārakajñāneyoryathā kāraṇabhāvo bhavati taddarśayitumāha -
SA15bsa061_u:584: vijñapteryadupādānakāraṇaṃ tena te santānāntarasambaddhakriyāvāgākārake jñāne janite /
SA15bsa061_u:585: tajjanisambandhena tena hetunā upacārād vijñaptīti vyapadiśyete // 63 //
SA15bsa061_u:587: na hi śrotā vaktṛsantānājjāte kriyāvākpratibhāsijñāne upalabhate /
SA15bsa061_u:588: tathā hi, vaktā śrotā cobhāvapi svasvapratibhāsamanu bhavataḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:589: tatkathaṃ te 'nālambane vijñaptitvena svasamutthāpakasya gamake iti / tasmādāha -
SA15bsa061_u:613: tathā hi, vaktā caivaṃ cintayati - yanmayā kathitaṃ tat śrotrā jñātam /
SA15bsa061_u:614: śrotāpyevaṃ cintayati - yadanena kathitaṃ tanmayā pratītam /
SA15bsa061_u:616: ekahetunā samutthāpakena ye sambhūte te ekahetusambhūte /
SA15bsa061_u:619: tathāpi tayoḥ ya ekahetusambhūte kriyāvāgākārakajñāne ta ekārthapratītiniyamād vijñaptitvena vyapadiśyete /
SA15bsa061_u:622: ekaḥ taimirikaḥ dvitīyaṃ taimirikaṃ 'paśya' iti “aparaṃ candraṃ' darśayati /
SA15bsa061_u:632: aviṣayatve tu kathaṃ jñānena paracittasattā pratīyate?
SA15bsa061_u:638: tasmājjātaṃ kriyādipratibhāsivijñānāt kāryaliṅgājjātaṃ yat paracittasya svarūpaṃ viṣayīkaroti āhosvinneti dvidhā parīkṣā /
SA15bsa061_u:648: sa tu tadabhāve na bhavatīti pūrvapakṣaḥ // 65 //
SA15bsa061_u:653: kriyāvāgbhyāṃ paracittapratipattimatāmapi tatsvarūpaviṣayīkaraṇe svacittajñānavattadākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta /
SA15bsa061_u:654: tadajñāne tu tena tatsvarūpasya grahaṇaṃ katham /
SA15bsa061_u:656: kiñca yadā bāhyārthāvādibhiḥ kriyāvāgbhyāṃ liṅgābhyāṃ paracittaṃ jñāyate,
SA15bsa061_u:657: tadā tasya paracittasya svarūpaṃ viṣayīkriyata āhosvinna?
SA15bsa061_u:661: tadā tena jñānena pratipattrā vā kathaṃ jñāyeta? // 67 //
SA15bsa061_u:663: atha liṅgāt sāmānyādhigateḥ nākārasya pratītiriti cet?
SA15bsa061_u:682: tasmāt kathamanena jñānena tat paracittaṃ jñāyate?
SA15bsa061_u:686: tathā sati tadākārastāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta ityuktam /
SA15bsa061_u:691: tadā paracittākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta ityuktaṃ prāk // 71 //
SA15bsa061_u:718: kvacit granthe 'tena nāsya prāmāṇyam' iti pāṭhaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:733: na hi dhūmādiliṅgājjātamanumānaṃ vahnyādeḥ svarūpasya grāhakatveneṣyate /
SA15bsa061_u:740: syādetat - paracittānumāne tasyāvisaṃvāditvameva nāsti / ata āha -
SA15bsa061_u:744: tatpravartanadvāreṇa prāṇyantarasattāṃ pratipadya punaḥ punarvyavahārapravṛttau tadādhipatyādāgatārthasya prāpteḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:747: taddvāreṇa prāṇyantarasattāṃ pratipadya yadi punaḥ punarvyavahārapravṛttimabhilāṣavyāyāmānyatrānyatragamanādikāṃ kuryāt,
SA15bsa061_u:751: atha vā punaḥ punarvyahāre pravartanamiti saṃlāpādanu gṛhapraveśaḥ,
SA15bsa061_u:757: kiṃ punaruttaravyahārasādhanāya prāmāṇyamiṣyata iti cet? ata āha -
SA15bsa061_u:763: yo lokaḥ tanmātraphalaṃ cintayati saḥ tanmātraphalacintakaḥ pravṛttaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:771: tathā pratibhāsituṃ śīlaṃ yasya jñānasya tattathā /
SA15bsa061_u:777: evamuktaṃ bhavati - yadā puruṣasya vahnyupalabdheranu dāhādipratibhāsijñānānubhavodayaḥ,
SA15bsa061_u:780: kintu kathaṃ tanmātreṇa pūrvajñānasya prāmāṇyamiti cet? āha -
SA15bsa061_u:796: tatra vijñaptijñānaṃ na kadāciccittaspandanādhipatyena vinā udbhavatītyataḥ tābhyāṃ te anumīyete /
SA15bsa061_u:803: viśeṣastvasyeṣaḥ - tato 'pio upaplutāvasthāyāṃ vyavahitādhipatyāt paramparayā udayaḥ,
SA15bsa061_u:806_1: vijñaptijñānād uttarakālabhāvijñānāni yathā spandanāyattāni bhavanti tathā pratipādayitumāha
SA15bsa061_u:806_2: - tatra yathā pūrvavijñaptijñānānāṃ paramparayā spandanādhipatyādudayaḥ tathā taduttarāvasthābhāvināmapi /
SA15bsa061_u:810: tatra paramparā tvevam - jāgradavasthāyāṃ prathamaṃ tāvat paraspandanādhipatyād vijñaptijñāne,
SA15bsa061_u:831: tatrāpi yādṛganumānaṃ tādṛgavisaṃvādo vyavahāraścāpyastyeveti kenāpi na gṛhyete /
SA15bsa061_u:833: svapnāvasthāyāmapi yādṛk yāvatkālaṃ paracittasya anumānaṃ tādṛk tāvatkālamātraṃ saṃlāpādirūpo 'visaṃvādo 'styeva /
SA15bsa061_u:837: ta evaṃ vyācakṣate - tatra svapnāvasthāyāmapi kāryaliṅgasya kāraṇe 'vyabhicārād yādṛk utpattidharmatayā paramparayā pūrvajñānasyānumānam,
SA15bsa061_u:844: yadi tāvat paracittasya svarūpaṃ sākṣāt jānanti,
SA15bsa061_u:850: ye tu sākṣāt paracittavidaḥ teṣāṃ tu katham?
SA15bsa061_u:854: tadā kathaṃ te yoginaḥ sākṣādvida iti matam // 87 //
SA15bsa061_u:863: arthasvarūpāgrahaṇe pramāṇatvaṃ nirākartumāha - atha na gṛhyate kathaṃ tarhi pramāṇamiti /
SA15bsa061_u:871: aprahīṇaḥ grāhyagrāhakavikalpo yeṣāṃ yogināṃ teṣāṃ tathā /
SA15bsa061_u:872: teṣāṃ yat paracittajñānaṃ tad vyavahāre 'visaṃvādādeva pramāṇam,
SA15bsa061_u:879: kathaṃ tarhi tat sphuṭākārakaṃ bhavatīti cet? āha -
SA15bsa061_u:884: yathā karmabalād devādyadhiṣṭhānabalācca satyasvapnadarśināṃ jñānaṃ sphuṭamarthākāramudeti // 90 //
SA15bsa061_u:885: yadyevaṃ cintyeta - bhavatu bhāvanābalādeva yogināṃ paracittajñānam,
SA15bsa061_u:888: te 'pi tadākārasadṛśasvacittapratibhāsameva jānantītyevamavadhāraṇād paracittavida iti vyavahāraḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:890: tat bhāvanābalājjātamapi paracittasya svarūpaṃ viṣayīkartuṃ na samartham /
SA15bsa061_u:892: yadi yoginaḥ paracittasya svarūpaṃ na jānanti,
SA15bsa061_u:895: yogino 'pi paracittākārasadṛśena svacittapratibhāsenaiva paracittaṃ jānanti [iti paracittavidaḥ] ityevamavadhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā vyavahāraḥ pravartate // 91 //
SA15bsa061_u:910: tadā bhagavataḥ jñānamapyayathārtha syāditi cet? āha -
SA15bsa061_u:914: acintyo hi yogivaryāṇāṃ tathā gatānāṃ buddhagocaraḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:938: tadevaṃ bhagavataḥ sarvārthajñānam eteṣu caturṣu yathāyogaṃ yojanīyam // 93 //
